privacy_intro: LivedHere is built around one core principle: your privacy comes first. We collect the minimum data needed to operate the service, and we never sell or share personal information.
privacy_what_we_collect: When you submit a review anonymously, we store only the review content and metadata (year range, duration, ratings). We do not store your IP address permanently. If you create an account, we store your email address solely for authentication.
privacy_pii: Every review is automatically scanned for personally identifiable information (email addresses, phone numbers, tax IDs, bank account numbers, social media handles). Reviews containing hard PII are blocked before they even enter our system.
privacy_moderation: Every review is read and approved by a human moderator before publication. This ensures no personal data, harassment, or false information reaches the public.
privacy_data_rights: You can delete your account at any time from the Account page. This permanently removes your email and all session data. Anonymous reviews you submitted remain published but cannot be traced back to you.
privacy_contact: If you have questions about your data or want to exercise your GDPR rights, reach out via the contact information in the app footer.
about_mission: Finding a good place to live shouldn't require luck. Too many people sign leases only to discover noise problems, pest infestations, negligent landlords, or unsafe neighborhoods. LivedHere exists to change that — by giving everyone access to honest, moderated living-quality reviews.
about_how: Anyone can search for a building and read reviews left by previous residents. Anyone can also submit a review — anonymously or with a verified account. Every review goes through human moderation and automatic privacy scanning before being published.
about_value_privacy: Privacy is non-negotiable. We block personal data, anonymize reviews, and never track you.
about_value_trust: Trust comes from moderation. Every review is read by a human before going live.
about_value_access: Access is universal. No paywall, no premium insights. Housing knowledge should be free.
about_value_bilingual: Built for Portuguese and English speakers alike, because language should never be a barrier.
